meanings.definition: The quality or state of being regular
meanings.sent1: Her daily routine had a comforting regularity to it.
meanings.sent2: The clock's regularity in ticking helped him fall asleep.
meanings.sent3: The regularity of the pattern on his socks always made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The regularity of the waves crashing against the shore was like nature's heartbeat.
meanings.sent5: The regularity of the train schedule was crucial for his daily commute.

meanings.definition: The act or process of regularizing
meanings.sent1: The regularity of the paperwork made the office run smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The regularity of his visits to the gym improved his health.
meanings.sent3: The regularity of the city's garbage collection was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The regularity of her breathing exercises calmed her mind.
meanings.sent5: The regularity of the maintenance checks kept the machines running efficiently.

meanings.definition: The condition of being regular in form or arrangement
meanings.sent1: The regularity of the geometric shapes in the design was pleasing to the eye.
meanings.sent2: The regularity of the rows of trees gave the garden a neat appearance.
meanings.sent3: The regularity of the bricks in the wall made it look like a giant puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The regularity of the music notes on the page made it easy to follow.
meanings.sent5: The regularity of the chessboard squares helped him plan his moves strategically.
